pages.text: $(heart) is an item that drops when the Wither is killed. This item, once eaten, will increase the amount of book slots available in the $(echest) by one.$(br)When the Wither is killed, one item for every player in the fight will be dropped. You can only pick up the item that is bound to you.

It was important for me that players are not spammed with $(heart) every time the Wither is killed, so the item will not drop for players who have the $(heart) in the inventory, or for those who already have eaten the $(heart).

pages.title: Reference
pages.text: The $(heart) is a direct reference to $(terraria) and the $(dheart). The $(dheart) in $(terraria) increases the amount of accessory slots you have by one, which is reflected in the $(heart). $(terraria) is a great game and I $(bold)HIGHLY$() recommend you play it if you haven't already.
